page1.title: Introduction
page1.description: Learn how to use the guide and how to create a client.

page2.title: Authentication
page2.description: Learn how to register and login users, and how to authenticate them.

page3.title: Display name
page3.description: Learn how to change the display name of a user.

page4.title: Rooms
page4.description: Learn how to create a room and invite users to it.

page5.title: Messaging
page5.description: Learn how to send messages to users within a room.

page6.title: WebRTC
page6.description: Learn how to setup a WebRTC video call between users within a room.
